title: Bug 15899 - Close all saved does not work all the time
OB: When using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, the 'Close All Saved' feature sometimes fails to close all the opened files.
EB: It should successfully close all the opened files, regardless of whether any changes have been made to them or not.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create a new file (e.g., f1.txt). 2. Open multiple files in the application. 3. Select 'Close All Saved' from the 'File' menu.
